title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 220.1 - Definition of supplements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 220.1 - Definition of supplements

State Regulations

Supplements, as defined in subdivision 5(b) of section
220
of the Labor Law, may include, but are not necessarily limited to, medical, dental or hospital
care, pensions on retirement or death, compensation for injuries or illness
resulting from occupational activity, or insurance to provide any of the
foregoing, unemployment benefits, life insurance, disability and sickness
insurance, accident insurance, vacation and holiday pay, costs of
apprenticeship or training or other similar programs, but only where the
contractor or subcontractor is not required by other Federal, State or local
law to provide such benefits. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
220.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
